document.heading: Small and Certified Business Enterprise Waiver and Recertification Amendment Act of 2014

history.narrative: Law 20-234, the “Small and Certified Business Enterprise Waiver and Recertification Amendment Act of 2014,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 20-892. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on Nov. 18, 2014, and Dec. 2, 2014, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on Dec. 31, 2014, it was assigned Act No. 20-558 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 20-234 became effective on Mar. 11, 2015.
